subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ralph's Research/EVP_Wheatfield_May_25_2007_says_Terrified_Frightening.wav 
  Uploaded by : ghostthostt <Ralphsmi@...> 
  Description : EVP from the Wheatfield in Gettysburg PA says " Terrified Frightning " 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ralph%27s%20Research/EVP_Wheatfield_May_25_2007_says_Terrified_Frightening.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

ghostthostt <Ralphsmi@...>
